synos.tran: 重商主义；商人本性；商业主义

words.tran: 商业的；商人的；重商主义的
绸缎商人；布商；呢绒布商

trans.tranCn: 重商主义； 营利主义； 商人本性
trans.tranOther: a theory prevalent in Europe during the 17th and 18th centuries asserting that the wealth of a nation depends on its possession of precious metals and therefore that the government of a nation must maximize the foreign trade surplus, and foster national commercial interests, a merchant marine, the establishment of colonies, etc
